articles.title: hsson - Portfolio
articles.contents:
Contents
1. Lecture 2 Homework
1-1. Mix filter( ) & select( )


Show code

library(tidyverse)
library(AmesHousing)
ames_raw %>%
  select(Street,`Year Built`,`SalePrice`) %>%
  filter(Street == "Pave") 


# A tibble: 2,918 x 3
   Street `Year Built` SalePrice
   <chr>         <int>     <int>
 1 Pave           1960    215000
 2 Pave           1961    105000
 3 Pave           1958    172000
 4 Pave           1968    244000
 5 Pave           1997    189900
 6 Pave           1998    195500
 7 Pave           2001    213500
 8 Pave           1992    191500
 9 Pave           1995    236500
10 Pave           1999    189000
# … with 2,908 more rows

1-2. Mix group_by( ) & summarize( )


Show code

ames_raw %>%
  group_by(Street) %>%
  summarize(`SalePrice`= mean(`SalePrice`,  na.rm = TRUE),
            `Lot Frontage` = mean(`Lot Frontage`, na.rm = TRUE))


# A tibble: 2 x 3
  Street SalePrice `Lot Frontage`
* <chr>      <dbl>          <dbl>
1 Grvl     106663.           88.2
2 Pave     181101.           69.1

Show code

ames_raw %>%
  group_by(`Sale Condition`) %>%
  summarize(`SalePrice`= mean(`SalePrice`,  na.rm = TRUE))


# A tibble: 6 x 2
  `Sale Condition` SalePrice
* <chr>                <dbl>
1 Abnorml            140396.
2 AdjLand            108917.
3 Alloca             161844.
4 Family             157489.
5 Normal             175568.
6 Partial            273374.

1-3. ggplot( )


Show code

library(ggplot2)
g<-ggplot(data = ames_raw %>%
            group_by(`Lot Shape`),
          aes(x=`Year Built`,
              y=`SalePrice`))
g<- g + geom_point(aes(color = as.factor(`Lot Shape`)))
g




1-4. box plot( )


Show code

ggplot(ames_raw, aes(y = `SalePrice`)) + geom_boxplot()



Show code

ggplot(ames_raw, aes(x = `Year Built`)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.5)




1-5. relation between Yr Sold and SalePrice


Show code

ames_raw %>%
  group_by(`Yr Sold`) %>%
  summarize(`SalePrice`= mean(`SalePrice`,  na.rm = TRUE))


# A tibble: 5 x 2
  `Yr Sold` SalePrice
*     <int>     <dbl>
1      2006   181762.
2      2007   185138.
3      2008   178842.
4      2009   181405.
5      2010   172598.

Show code

h<-ggplot(data = ames_raw %>%
          group_by(`Yr Sold`) %>%
          summarize(`SalePrice`= mean(`SalePrice`,  na.rm = TRUE)),
          aes(x= `Yr Sold`,
              y= `SalePrice`))
h<- h + geom_point(aes(color = as.factor(`Yr Sold`)))
h




1-6. relation between MS Zoning and SalePrice


Show code

ames_raw %>%
  group_by(`MS Zoning`) %>%
  summarize(`SalePrice`= mean(`SalePrice`,  na.rm = TRUE))


# A tibble: 7 x 2
  `MS Zoning` SalePrice
* <chr>           <dbl>
1 A (agr)        47300 
2 C (all)        79795.
3 FV            218987.
4 I (all)        80312.
5 RH            136420.
6 RL            191283.
7 RM            126781.

Show code

h<-ggplot(data = ames_raw %>%
          group_by(`MS Zoning`) %>%
          summarize(`SalePrice`= mean(`SalePrice`,  na.rm = TRUE)),
          aes(x= `MS Zoning`,
              y= `SalePrice`))
h<- h + geom_point(aes(color = as.factor(`MS Zoning`)))
h
